meanings.sent1: She dirtied her hands while gardening.
meanings.sent2: The children dirtied their clothes playing outside.
meanings.sent3: He dirtied the floor with his muddy shoes.
meanings.sent4: The rain dirtied the once pristine sidewalk.
meanings.sent5: The careless painter dirtied the walls with splashes of paint.

meanings.sent1: The dirtied windows obscured the view outside.
meanings.sent2: Her dirtied apron showed she had been baking all day.
meanings.sent3: The dirtied dog happily wagged its tail.
meanings.sent4: The dirtied car looked like it had been on an off-road adventure.
meanings.sent5: The dirtied path led through the forest, hinting at a hidden treasure.
